src:
Ghanda Gucci: Gabuza’s Hottest Looks In Gucci
01 Nov 2019, 11:30 by SL Social




















Talk about a man who got a new lease on life. 
 Thamsanqa Gabuza has been an invigorated figure since joining SuperSport United from Orlando Pirates this season. The man known as Ghanda Ghanda also has a penchant for the Gucci brand and rocks it with relative ease.
 Download The Soccer Laduma Social Media App & Earn Airtime for Selfies!
 The 31-year-old has rediscovered his scoring boots in the capital city and looks a man reborn. A controversial yet loved figure, the KZN-born striker is a jovial presence in any dressing room.
 Away from the field, Gabuza is a fashionable person with street swag and a wild side to him, not bound by any rules.
 Take a look at Gabuza’s hottest Gucci looks in the gallery above.
 Having seen Orlando Pirates’ current form, do you think they miss Gabuza’s presence on the field?
